content:
I'm glad you're excited to track the success of your social media campaign! As a marketing specialist at a tech startup, I've been using a combination of native analytics tools and third-party software to monitor our performance.

For Twitter, I've been using Twitter Analytics to track our engagement rate, reach, impressions, and URL clicks. I've also been monitoring our hashtag performance to see which ones are driving the most engagement.

For LinkedIn, I've been using LinkedIn Insights to track our post views, engagement rate, and click-through rate. I've also been monitoring our follower growth rate and post shares to see how our content is resonating with our audience.

In addition to native analytics tools, I've been using a third-party software like Hootsuite to schedule and track our social media posts across both Twitter and LinkedIn. This has helped me to streamline our content calendar and ensure consistency across both platforms.

To measure the success of our campaign, I'll be tracking our lead generation, conversion rate,
